# PageTagSet.SplitTaglist method

Split a comma separated list of tags into a collection of individual tags.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<string> SplitTaglist(string taglist)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| taglist | The comma separated list of tagnames. HTML markup is not allowed |

## Return Value

Collection if individiual tags.
